short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast access to pinned tabs in all open windows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some tabs are more important than others, and deserve to be pinned.
PinView lists all pinned tabs (from all windows) on a menu, and lets you reach them quickly with a shortcut.
Especially helpful if you have many windows open, and you lose track of your pinned tabs.

PinView works best when paired with the companion PWA - see app link below, in the Official URL.
